channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 16:40 Alarm lifted in Poltava region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游릭 16:40 Alarm lifted in Poltava region. Follow further messages. #Poltava_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 16:40 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in: - Marhanets city and Marhanets territorial community - Chervonohryhoriv territorial community
item.description: 游리 16:40 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in: - Marhanets city and Marhanets territorial community - Chervonohryhoriv territorial community #Dnipropetrovsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 15:51 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Chervonohryhorivsk territorial community. Go to shelter!
item.description: 游댮 15:51 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Chervonohryhorivsk territorial community. Go to shelter! #Chervonohryhorivsk_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 15:39 Repel the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. Follow further reports.
item.description: 游릭 15:39 Repel the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. item.title: 游 15:37 WARNING!!! Threat of use of guided aerial bombs (GABs).
item.description: 游 15:37 WARNING!!! Threat of use of guided aerial bombs (GABs).#Zaporizhzhia_district This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
